DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE ( REQUIRED_RESOURCE VARCHAR2(50), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(80), BATCH_SUFFIX VARCHAR2(15), ENABLED VARCHAR2(1) )

insert into APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE SELECT DISTINCT REQUIRED_RESOURCE AS REQUIRED_RESOURCE,'' AS DESCRIPTION, '' AS BATCH_SUFFIX,'Y' AS ENABLED FROM APP_PROCESS_ORDER WHERE REQUIRED_RESOURCE IS NOT NULL AND REQUIRED_RESOURCE != ''
